pasaloswaka poho dinaye dawasa purada irida dinaye paswaru eka dakwa da dambaulla nagaraye di pasal lamun sandaha pawathwena paudgalika upakaraka panthi pawathwima janawari palamuwanida sita athhituwimata thiranaya kara athayi nagaradhipathi jaliya oopatha mahatha pawasiya.wishesha madhya hamuwak pawathwamin nagaradhipathiwaraya me bawa danum dun athara mema thiranayata dambaulla maha nagara sabhawe paksha wipaksha siyalu manthriwarunge kamaththa palawu bawada pawasiya.upakaraka panthi yana muwawen daruwan boho denek daham pasal nogos wiwidha akatayuthukamwala nirathawana bawata heliwimath samanga mema thiranayata elambai bawada nagaradhipathiwaraya pawasiya.upakaraka panthi pawathwanu labana guruwarun ha ema aayathana himikaruwan samanga sakachcha kota ema ayageda kamaththa athiwa mema thiranayata elambai bawa da oopatha mahatha pawasiya.me awasthawata nagarika manthriwarun wana ke. es. di. sarathchandra, samira jayasekara yana mahathwaru ekwa sitiyaha..
